footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Layla | Update Date: 11/10/2022 | Editor: ~Z~#0009

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Key of Khaj-Nisut__
Best support option for Layla as it significantly improves her shield with its HP main stat and supports the team via Mastery buffs.

__Primordial Jade Cutter__
Great weapon for Layla assuming you're building into her Dmg. Can easily take care of Layla's crit needs by itself while also giving her a bit more HP.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Festering Desire__
Helps her recharge her Burst and increases the dmg dealing potential of her Skill.

__Harbinger of Dawn__
Budget choice but offers solid help to Layla since her Dmg all scales off HP meaning the low Atk will not matter at all.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Nights of Formal Focus
**2)** Elemental Burst: Dream of the Star-Stream Shaker
**3)** Normal Attack: Sword of the Radiant Path
